Name: The adventure of Kroos
About the game: The adventures of Kroos is a magic style 2D horizontal action adventure game. Rich and interesting BOSS warfare, sophisticated design agencies, and plot scenarios closely linked to the puzzle design, in addition to testing the player's operation, but also to seriously consider the strategy of clearance. Ten years ago, the Night race, an Eldar race, as suffered from the aggression of numerous ethnics alliance, almost died out. Kroos, as one of the few survivors of the Night, was determined to avenge and revive the Night race. With the footsteps of Kroos's adventure, exploring this continent together, we found the secret behind the war. War or not, the final outcome of the story will be determined by your choice. - Dozens of species of unique monsters, do not underestimate them; - Experience different styles of Boss war; - Multi-Purpose throwing props design; - Different types of sophisticated design barriers; - Five types of weapons design, each unique; - Multi-branch plot design, each operation is likely to affect the plot direction, the outcome of your control!
